edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course

Class Event

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Activity
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.course.Event
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Conflict

    public class Event
extends Activity
    Event subclass of Activity to maintain Event behaviors and state each Event has a unique title subclass of Activity which maintains title, meetingDays, startTime, endTime eventDetails and weeklyRepeat are unique to Event
    Author:
    Summer Mims
